titleStmt.title: The first part of the nature of a vvoman Fitly described in a Florentine historie. Composed by C.M.
titleStmt.author: C. M., fl. 1596.
Middleton, Christopher, 1560?-1628, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Valentine Simmes, for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the little north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by STC to Christopher Middleton.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
